de.affect.appraisal.eec

Class Liking

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.appraisal.eec.Liking

  • public class Liking
extends java.lang.Object
    The Liking class reflects how attracted to another person one is.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard (based on the work of Martin Klesen)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Liking(double degree)
      Returns a new Liking object using the specified value to describe the degree of liking.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double absDegree()
      Returns the absolut degree to which the other person is liked or disliked.
      double degree()
      Returns the degree to which the other person is liked or disliked.
      boolean isLiked()
      Returns true if the other person is liked and false if the other person is disliked.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representing the liking for another person.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Liking

        public Liking(double degree)
        Returns a new Liking object using the specified value to describe the degree of liking.
        Parameters:
        degree - the degree of liking. A negative value denotes disliking.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the degree is not a real number in the interval [0.0,1.0].

    • Method Detail

      • isLiked

        public boolean isLiked()
        Returns true if the other person is liked and false if the other person is disliked.
        Returns:
        true if the other person is liked; false if it is disliked.

      • degree

        public double degree()
        Returns the degree to which the other person is liked or disliked.
        Returns:
        the degree of liking.

      • absDegree

        public double absDegree()
        Returns the absolut degree to which the other person is liked or disliked.
        Returns:
        the absolut degree to which the other person is liked or disliked.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representing the liking for another person.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representing the liking for another person.
